Calibre.description:
Calibre is an open source e-Book management program.

Calibre allows for the management of e-Books and syncing across devices using the content server.

For more information visit Calibre's Official Site. and the Docker container page.

/config.description: Choose a Share for the Calibre configuration data. Eg: create a Share called calibre-config.
/config.label: Config Storage

/books.description: Choose a Share with e-Book content. Eg: create a Share called ebook-media for this purpose alone or use an existing share. It will be available as /books. You can also add more shares later.
/books.label: e-Book Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID of an existing user with permission to e-Book shares to run Calibre as.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID of an existing user with permission to e-Book shares to run Calibre as.
PGID.label: GID
